title: Munich
creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Amblin Entertainment, Barry Mendel Productions, Alliance Atlantis Communications, Peninsula Films, DreamWorks Pictures, The Kennedy/Marshall Company, Rick Carter, Joanna Johnston, Barry Mendel, Eric Roth, Steven Spielberg, Kathleen Kennedy, Colin Wilson and Tony Kushner
headline_credit: Canada, France and United States of America, 2005
brief_description: During the 1972 Olympic Games in Munich, eleven Israeli athletes are taken hostage and murdered by a Palestinian terrorist group known as Black September. In retaliation, the Israeli government recruits a group of Mossad agents to track down and execute those responsible for the attack.

constellations_other.name: No guts, no glory
constellations_other.description: TV arrived just in time for the 1956 Melbourne Olympics. The Olympics crystallise ideas of nationalism, athletic heroism, and controversy, all of which have been explored through countless features, documentaries and TV shows.
